subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Although he never faced Big Brown or Zenyatta on the racetrack, Curlin beat them anyway, winning the three-horse race for 2008 Horse of the Year in a romp.
snippet: Although he never faced Big Brown or Zenyatta on the racetrack, Curlin beat them anyway, winning the three-horse race for 2008 Horse of the Year in a romp.
